replies.body: Seems really cool, glad to see community events like this are still a thing, can't wait to get my naughty on
He shall be in the deep end now.. huheuheuhue{{champion:111}}
So is the statue in real life?
Yep! And we will sink it in a very real ocean.
holding you to this riot
Where?
Legit? Wowzers I was expecting it to be in the rift river or something like that. If this is for real I am impressed.
statue needs to be naut
cuz like if it gets all rusty and stuff it will still look like naut
Maybe its not a Statue... {{champion:111}}
Maybe it's {{champion:111}}  a statue.
maybe it's maybelline
It has 2 be {{champion:111}} . Coz it hints directly to his lore. And i think it will just look awesome down there.
Yeah I hope everyone votes for nautilus if we do reach the goal. The statue better be him swimming around magically floating above the "artificial reef."
Just a question for the artificial reef. Where will it be when we unlock it?

Hi DubstepOrigami,

We can't say where exactly yet. Which I know is disappointing but there is a long approvals process we need to go through.

Basically we're working with an artificial reef company in conjunction with a marine biologist and we need to gain approval for the reef site (where we can place an underwater artificial reef).

We want to make sure it's in the best interests of the sea creatures we're making a home for to drop a champion on them.

We'll provide more updates as it gets made - assuming the goal gets unlocked =)
Ye Um why doesnt Ranked count?

Hi  xArcaneAvengerx,

We considered making this for Ranked as well, but we were a little worried that it could disrupt gameplay when people choose Ocean Week champs to try and contribute points instead of the laser-focus on getting that LP.

I mostly play ranked as well, so I hear you on wishing it was for ranked. But normals will likely be a little more flexible when picking Ocean Week champs. 

You also can't use the free rotation champs in ranked which could skew the experience a little as well.
Probably so that nobody would just instalock the water champions, ignoring meta/team needs/whatever else
Wow what a great idea guys this should be fun i hope we make it all the way to the Artificial Reef :D
Me too!!
{{champion:111}} 100% should sink nautilus to the bottom of the ocean because it reflects his lore, please, it will be so cool. can you imagine iit?
If the community gets 275000 does that mean we get all the rewards?

Hi Toonarmy,

Good question!

If the community contributes 275,000 then everyone who has contributed 3 points before it unlocks will get their name recorded on the artifical reef.

In case you missed it the 4-Win Ip boost works that way too. You need to contribute at least 1 point before it's unlocked to get it.

Basically play games and win them before a goal is unlocked during Ocean Week and you are good =)
Great idea riot! Seems like a great way to get the community to work together for an overall goal. 10/10!
So you need to win 275 000 games for a prize???

Hey Osomon,

They are community goals, meaning everyone contributes towards them. 

If the community contributes enough points it will unlock =)
Read everything again and then think about what you just said. Especially the first paragraph.

Yeah there will be plenty of photos before/during/after the sinking!
angler jax is fisherman jax >.>

Can't wait for the Nautilus statue :3{{champion:111}}

As a diver it would be sweet to travel to the site and find your own name before it gets to covered in coral and sealife. Side note this is the coolest thing I have seen any company do =)

I want my name in the middle of the ocean :P

So, you are going to create a statue of the selected champion and throw it into the ocean with all of our summoner names etched in. Awesome!! Where are you planning on sinking it? How big are you planning to make it?
**Only** the last **3** summoners that have contributed to the 275, 000 goal will have their summoner name etched onto the statue

>  If you contribute at least three points before this goal is reached your Summoner Name will be recorded on the statue that gets sunk to the bottom of the ocean.

Everyone will get their names if they fulfil the requirements
How Will You Get To Know When A Challenge/Goal Finishes.
You can check the progress on a website that riot will be putting up once the event starts
So with the 275,000 goal, are the votes based off how much that champion is played, or is there going to be a vote?

"Unlocking this goal will trigger a vote to decide if the statue should be Fizz, Nami or Nautilus!"
So if we pass the goal then we will get to vote.
